                   RetrievalEnvironment env,
                   String spamScoresPath,
                   int bitsPerElement,

                            throws IOException
        Creates Signatures and writes them to disk.
        Parameters:
        outputPath - Root path to store the output in.
        fs - File system
        env - Retireval Environment
        spamScoresPath - Path to spam/quality scores
        bitsPerElement - Number of bits dedicated to one element
        nbHash - Number of hash functions
        Throws:
        IOException
